name: NEO GROUP
goal:
A dynamic, modern manufacturer of polyethylene terephthalate (PET) resins, NEO GROUP is one of Europe’s leading producers of high-quality PET resins and polyols.
Continuous improvement and innovation is a NEO GROUP value that allows us to maintain our position as the leader in our field. We pay exceptional attention to the highest standard of sustainability regarding raw materials, energy usage, and recycling, with the long-term environmental quality of our business as important as short- and medium-term results.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Single use plastic directive, following trade defence policy, environmental, energy policies
